pages.text: $(l)$(item)Pacifying Amulet$() - is one of the $(o)'ancient and hard'$() amulets.$(br2)Creating this amulet is a very difficult task, that can be accomplished only with $(o)'instruction'$().!$(br2)$(l)USAGE$(): $(li)pacifies passive mobs like endermen, wolves, etc.$(li)if mob can't be pacified, it disorientates it.
$(l)WARNING!$() Overusing this amulet may lead to unforeseen consequences!$(br)As it's made of aether, $(o)it can't stabilize itself$() like normal amulets do!
